analysis.reasoning: Gold demonstrates breakout continuation despite some intraday consolidation, closing at 4301.05 while maintaining position above all major moving averages. The technical structure remains strongly bullish with RSI at 68.78 (strong but not extreme), MACD positive, and ADX showing trend strength. Cross-asset signals remain highly favorable with DXY showing extreme weakness (RSI 29.38, bearish EMA stack) which historically supports gold appreciation. The medium volatility regime with mean-reverting properties suggests continued upward momentum potential. While price showed some consolidation near the 4335 resistance, the overall breakout structure remains intact with strong underlying support levels.
